scripts.db: docker compose up -d db && yarn db-wait && yarn migrate && yarn codegen
scripts.redb: docker compose exec db ./reset.sh && yarn migrate && yarn codegen
scripts.db-wait: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); let i = 0; while (i++ < 30) { try { execSync('docker compose exec db pg_isready -U {{DB_USER}}', { stdio: 'ignore' }); process.exit(0); } catch { require('child_process').execSync('sleep 1'); } } process.exit(1);"
